body.p:
Owensboro Ky Feby 21st 1861
Hon Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Ky
Dear Sir

Enclosed I send you Memorial in the case of Comth vs M. Smithimer. Mr Smithimer is a very good Citizen and a law abiding man. I hope you will grant the Petition -- The fine is a very onerous one indeed -- The proof established that certain parties merely played a game of Euchre for Beer -- If you can remit the fine please notify your friend &c

Sweeney & Taylor
By R Hawes Taylor
